subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: Facing the American League’s top staff, the Mets hit four home runs, including one by Travis d’Arnaud in his return from Class AAA, to back the pitching of Bartolo Colon.
snippet: Facing the American League’s top staff, the Mets hit four home runs, including one by Travis d’Arnaud in his return from Class AAA, to back the pitching of Bartolo Colon.
